name: For God's Sake
storyline:
For God's Sake tells the story of a young cheeky god named Leigh. Weary of his tricks and ploys, the gods banned him from the kingdom of gods. To cancel his ban, he must face his greatest trial ever: helping people. 
 
To be sure, Leigh follows their rules, the gods sent their uptight servant Tilly to observe Leigh. But the barefaced god nevertheless tries to deceive his ancestors and retaliate them for his exile. 
 
There he comes across the dark secrets of the gods…
summary:
For God's Sake is a 2D Action-Platformer with souls-like elements. The game itself generates new trials and quests to provide varied and exciting stories. The world is full of humorous characters and dialogues as well atmospheric settings. 
 
The game tells the story of a young cheeky god named Leigh. Weary of his tricks and ploys, the gods ban him from the kingdom of gods. To cancel his ban, he must face his greatest trial ever: helping people. 
 
To be sure, Leigh follows their rules, the gods sent their uptight servant Tilly to observe Leigh. But the barefaced god nevertheless tries to deceive his ancestors and retaliate them for his exile. 
 
There he comes across the dark secrets of the gods…
